name: Virgilio
description:
Virgilio is a short game born during the first #gdugamejam.

In "Virgilio", your soul is going to be Judged. You have till sunset to explore the town and show that you have collected all the four keys of the virtues to UNLOCK the gate of Heaven.

Estimated running time: less than 5 minutes (if you want to save your soul!)

Controls: 

  • WASD + Mouse to move and look around

Credits:

Main Theme Music__Juan Sanchez - Tolworth

Inferno Theme__Mattia Cupelli - Dark Tension Rising Music

Assisi City Scene 01__Nioma van der Steen

Assisi City Scene 02__Alexm00
